name: rescript-recoil
description: Zero-cost bindings to Facebook's Recoil library

scripts.format: find ./src -iname '*.re' | xargs bsrefmt --in-place && find ./src -iname '*.rei' | xargs bsrefmt -i true --in-place && find ./test -iname '*.re' | xargs bsrefmt --in-place && find ./examples -iname '*.re' | xargs bsrefmt --in-place

author: bloodyowl <bloodyowl@icloud.com>
